snippet: Not all gossip is bad, according to researchers, who say it can be useful in maintaining social norms and keeping people in line.
abstract: Studies published in the The Journal of Personality and Social Psychology and journal Social Psychological and Personality Science indicate that gossip, usually thought of negatively, is useful in maintaining social norms and pressuring individuals to behave acceptably.
lead_paragraph: Not all gossip is bad, according to researchers, who say it can be useful in maintaining social norms and keeping people in line.
